name: (No) Escape From the City
description:
This game has been made during a Game Jam in Intro to Games Development class at NYU Game Center.

The game was made by Matthew Russo, Madeline Falacci and Tarik Zulfikarpasic.

For some reason, the game is not working on Chrome. For complete playing experience, view the game in full screen on Mozilla Firefox. Enjoy the game!
